title: The Hottest Location in Uptown*Dining and Shopping at Your Door Step**
posting_body: An Upscale and Chic Apartment in the Most Desirable Location in the Uptown/West Village Area!!
Shopping and Entertainment Right at Your Doorstep, with Easy Access to Many Restaurants, Stores, and NightLife!
Each Apartment Includes Beautiful White Quartz Countertops, Hardwood Floors, and Stainless Steel Appliances in the Kitchen!!
On Top of That, They Also Include Garden Tub and Stand-Up Shower with Washer and Dryer Included in Your Chic Apartment Home!
With Great Views of Downtown, a Resort-Style Pool with Sun Deck and Cabanas, State of the Art Gym, and Even a Lush Dog Park!!
Most Importantly They Have Great Management and Maintenance!!
Please Contact Jacquelyn with Dash Realty at
**12 Month Lease or Longer, No Corporate Leases, and No Sublease**
